flame_resonance.name: Flame Resonance
flame_resonance.description: Increase flame ATK by **15%** and flame resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

flame_reaction.name: Flame Reaction
flame_reaction.description: Increase flame ATK by **20%** and flame resistance by **40%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

flame_benediction.name: Flame Benediction
flame_benediction.description: Increase entire team's flame ATK by **5%** when Benediction Resonance is activated.

volt_resonance.name: Volt Resonance
volt_resonance.description: Increase volt ATK by **15%** and volt resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

volt_benediction.name: Volt Benediction
volt_benediction.description: Increase entire team's volt ATK by **5%** when Benediction Resonance is activate.

physical_resonance.name: Physical Resonance
physical_resonance.description: Increase physical ATK by **15%** and physical resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

physical_benediction.name: Physical Benediction
physical_benediction.description: Increase entire team's physical ATK by **5%** when Benediction Resonance is activate.

frost_resonance.name: Frost Resonance
frost_resonance.description: Increase frost ATK by **15%** and frost resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

frost_reaction.name: Frost Reaction
frost_reaction.description: Increase frost ATK by **15%** and frost resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

frost_benediction.name: Frost Benediction
frost_benediction.description: Increase entire team's frost ATK by **5%** when Benediction Resonance is activate.

weapons_master.name: Weapons Master
weapons_master.description: When pairing Shadoweave with other weapons, the **Weapons Master** effect can be created. Epiphyllum will appear around the target randomly and explode within **1-3** seconds, dealing **25%** area damage.

balanced_resonance.name: Elemental Balancing
balanced_resonance.description: Increase all ATK by **15%**. Activate by equipping **3** weapons of different elements. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot.

elementalist.name: Elementalist
elementalist.description: Increase final damage by **1.5%** for every **1** type of weapon element equipped. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot.

altered_effect_ssr.name: Altered Damage
altered_effect_ssr.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will mark the target, causing an explosion after **5** seconds. Additionally inflict **25%** of all damage received by the target while the mark exists, up to a total of **560%** of your ATK. Only 1 mark can be added on a target at a time.

flame_effect_r.name: Flame
flame_effect_r.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will ignite the target for **8** seconds, causing damage equal to **27.00%** of ATK every second. Ignited targets have **50%** reduced outgoing healing.

flame_effect_ssr.name: Flame
flame_effect_ssr.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will ignite the target for **8** seconds, causing damage equal to **58.00%** of ATK every second. Ignited targets have **50%** reduced outgoing healing.

volt_effect_r.name: Volt
volt_effect_r.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will **strongly paralyze** targets for **1** second and electrify them for **6** seconds, removing all their buffs and dealing damage equal to **67.00%** of ATK. Targets can't receive any buffs for the next **6** seconds.

volt_effect_sr.name: Volt
volt_effect_sr.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will **strongly paralyze** targets for **1** second and electrify them for **6** seconds, removing all their buffs and dealing damage equal to **106.00%** of ATK. Targets can't receive any buffs for the next **6** seconds.

volt_effect_ssr.name: Volt
volt_effect_ssr.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will **strongly paralyze** targets for **1** second and electrify them for **6** seconds, removing all their buffs and dealing damage equal to **144.00%** of ATK. Targets can't receive any buffs for the next **6** seconds.

physical_effect_r.name: Grievous
physical_effect_r.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will inflict damage equal to **63.00%** of ATK, and make the target grievous for **7** seconds, taking **20%** extra damage.

physical_effect_sr.name: Grievous
physical_effect_sr.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will inflict damage equal to **100.00%** of ATK, and make the target grievous for **7** seconds, taking **20%** extra damage.

physical_effect_ssr.name: Grievous
physical_effect_ssr.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will inflict damage equal to **137.00%** of ATK, and make the target grievous for **7** seconds, taking **20%** extra damage.

frost_effect_r.name: Ice Shell
frost_effect_r.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will **strongly freeze** targets for **2** seconds and leave them frostbitten for **6** seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to **70.00%** of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by **50%**.

frost_effect_sr.name: Ice Shell
frost_effect_sr.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will **strongly freeze** targets for **2** seconds and leave them frostbitten for **6** seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to **111.00%** of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by **50%**.

frost_effect_ssr.name: Ice Shell
frost_effect_ssr.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will **strongly freeze** targets for **2** seconds and leave them frostbitten for **6** seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to **151.00%** of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by **50%**.
